overview: Reuland, CEO and founder of Credit Coach, has a background in the mortgage industry. He served as a loan officer in NE Wisconsin for several years before founding Credit Coach LLC in 2007, which, within two years, became the largest licensed credit services organization in Wisconsin. In 2008 he conceptualized Credit Coach and founded Credit Coach Inc., shortly thereafter. Reuland is a graduate of the University of Wisconsin Green Bay and holds a Bachelorâ€™s degree in English
